Phantasmal Sphere
  • Discussion
  • Languages
  • Sets & Legality
  • Details
 
Display: Oracle | Printed
Card Name:
Phantasmal Sphere
Mana Cost:
Converted Mana Cost:
2

Types:
Creature — Illusion
Card Text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Phantasmal Sphere, then sacrifice Phantasmal Sphere unless you pay for each +1/+1 counter on it.
When Phantasmal Sphere leaves the battlefield, put a blue Orb creature token with flying onto the battlefield under target opponent's control. That creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on Phantasmal Sphere.
P/T:
0 / 1
Expansion:
Alliances
Rarity:
Rare
Artist:
Mark Tedin
Community Rating:
